title: Tab Bar Navigation
refs: emailed notes about feedback on these

custom_steps_separated.expected:
The top left nav bar has a Teams button 
And tapping that button slides up the Team Picker modal

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a team in the Team Picker
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought to the Team View for that team

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is brought to a new Team View from the Team Picker
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the colors on the sub nav and the bottom tab bar will change to reflect the new team

(sub nav: background behind BALLPARK and TICKETS is team color)
(bottom tab  bar: selected icon uses team color)
**please check for all teams**

custom_steps_separated.content: When bottom tab bar is present
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see:
1. Team logo and team name
2. Inbox button
3. Journal button
4. Settings button

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the Journal button on the bottom tab bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the Journal page
And the Journal button will be selected team color

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the Settings button on the bottom tab bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Settings page
And the Settings button will be selected team color

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the Team button on the bottom tab bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the Ballpark Guide, Tickets Dashboard, or Loyalty View depending on Sub Nav selection of the team

custom_steps_separated.content: When navigating to the Team View of a ballpark with native ticketing and no loyalty
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see two sub nav options: Ballpark and Tickets

custom_steps_separated.content: When navigating to the Team View of a ballpark with native ticketing and loyalty
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see three sub nav options: Ballpark,Tickets and <Program Name> in that order (example: San Diego)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user switches to a team that has Ticket Dashboard set to default in the ballpark.json (e.g. Cleveland on Prod)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Tickets Dashboard will be default selected sub nav
Otherwise the Ballpark Guide is defaulted

custom_steps_separated.content: When the team has a Loyalty Program
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the sub nav will always show the full name for that program (10 char limit)
And the name will not ellipse

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Ballpark Guide
And the team has native ticketing
And the user has tickets to this team(any number of games not just the current game)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Tickets tab will have a tickets icon displaying to show that the user has tickets for the team

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user swipes left to right on the Ballpark Guide in the area below the header and above the bottom tab bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then user will be able to switch sub tabs

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on an item in the sub nav
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to that view

title: "Team" button is present on ballpark guide page AND user can tap on it to slide up the team picker module
custom_expected:
THE top left nav bar has a Teams button 
AND tapping that button slides up the Team Picker modal

title: User is brought to the team view for a team user taps on in the team picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a team in the Team Picker
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to the Team View for that team

title: Team view colors on the sub nav and the bottom tab bar change to reflect the new team selected from team picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user is brought to a new Team View from the Team Picker
custom_expected:
THEN the colors on the sub nav and the bottom tab bar will change to reflect the new team

(sub nav: background behind BALLPARK and TICKETS is team color)
(bottom tab bar: selected icon uses team color)
please check for all teams

title: Bottom tab bar displays Today, Team, Journal, Inbox
custom_steps: WHEN bottom tab bar is present
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see:
Today
Team
Journal
Inbox

(as of 7.1, likely to change in the future as the Discover tab is done)

title: Tapping journal button navigates user to journal page and the button will be in team color
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Journal button on the bottom tab bar
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Journal page
And the Journal button will be selected team color

title: Tapping settings button navigates user to settings page and the button will be in team color
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Settings button on the bottom tab bar
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be taken to the Settings page
AND the Settings button will be selected team color

title: Tapping team button navigates user to the ballpark guide, tickets dashboard, or loyalty view depending on sub nav selection of the team
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Team button on the bottom tab bar
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the Ballpark Guide, Tickets Dashboard, or Loyalty View depending on Sub Nav selection of the team

title: User sees two sub nav options: Ballpark and Tickets when navigating to team view of ballpark with native ticketing and no loyalty
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Team View of a ballpark with native ticketing and no loyalty
custom_expected: THEN the user will see two sub nav options: Ballpark and Tickets

title: User sees 3 sub nav options: Ballpark, Tickets and <Program Name> when navigated to team view of ballpark with Fortress loyalty
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Team View of a ballpark with native ticketing and loyalty (as of 2018 Opening Day - Boston, San Diego, Washington)
custom_expected: THEN the user will see three sub nav options: Ballpark, Tickets and <Program Name> in that order

title: User switches to a team that has Ticket Dashboard set to default in the ballpark.json (e.g. Cleveland on Prod)
custom_steps: WHEN the user switches to a team that has Ticket Dashboard set to default in the ballpark.json (e.g. Cleveland on Prod)
custom_expected:
THEN the Tickets Dashboard will be default selected sub nav
Otherwise the Ballpark Guide is defaulted

title: For team that has loyalty program sub nav always show full name for a program (10 char limit)
custom_steps: WHEN the team has a Loyalty Program
custom_expected:
THEN the sub nav will always show the full name for the program (10 char limit)
AND the name will not ellipsis

title: Tickets tab will show tickets icon displaying to show that the user has tickets for specific team
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Ballpark Guide
AND the team has native ticketing
AND the user has tickets to this team(any number of games not just the current game)
custom_expected: THEN the tickets tab will have a tickets icon displaying to show that the user has tickets for the team

title: User is able to switch tabs when swiping left to right on ballpark guide
custom_steps: WHEN the user swipes left to right on the Ballpark Guide in the area below the header and above the bottom tab bar
custom_expected: THEN user will be able to switch sub tabs

title: Upon tapping item in sub nav the user is navigated to that view
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on an item in the sub nav
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to that view
